name: Azure Striker Gunvolt 3: Ex Image Pulses - Merak and Teseo Pack
summary: This pack adds 4 skill-type Image Pulses of Azure Striker Gunvolt's "Merak," 4 skill-type Image Pulses of Azure Striker Gunvolt 2's "Teseo," plus 3 additional passive-type Image Pulses, for a total of 11.

name: Azul Baronis
summary: A top-down spaceship shooter flash game produced by Mofunzone.com in like 2007.

name: Azalea
summary: Azalea is a short, cute-yet-spooky puzzle adventure that takes the player through the deadly Forbidden Forest.

name: Azumanga Fighter: Come Back!
summary: The game features the six main girls as playable characters, each having an unlockable EX character variant. Starring alongside them are their teachers- Yukari and Nyamo, both unlockable.

name: Aza: Zend vs. The Dark End
summary: Help Zend save himself the Dark End and his anxieties, in this Narrative-driven Action-RPG shrouded in darkness. Discover and customize new abilities, save the lives of others, hack, slash, and power your way through mysterious creatures from the darkness, and learn just who the secretive Aza is!!

name: A Zone
summary: A Zone is a leisure game of black and white painting style It contains stubble finding and elimination elements

name: Aztlan Uncovered
summary:
Explore an archeological site long lost to the ages. Use your time-reversing equipment to reveal the past and discover the secrets amidst the frozen wasteland.

Breaking news: a new archeological site has been found that will change the future of mankind. A temple frozen in its own time-bubble and long lost to the ages has been discovered amidst a frozen wasteland.

Use your equipment and your wit to reveal the past and enter the temple to find out what is causing this place to be finally revealed to the world for what was once lost in the snow, has come forth in the thaw.

Discover its secrets and unravel the mystery behind this beautiful landscape.

name: Aztez
summary: In Aztez, you expand and maintain the Aztec empire through turn-based strategy, while managing violent outbreaks via real-time beat 'em up sequences. Every game is unique; different events will occur, different challenges will emerge, and different spoils will be taken each time you play. Spread, strengthen, subjugate!

name: Azure Reflections
summary:
"Azure Reflections, the vibrant, side-scrolling, bullet hell"

"Dominate levels and relentlessly attack enemies with a variety of skills and upgrades. All three playable characters Reimu, Marisa, and Cirno have heavy hitting spell cards, bullet-absorbing barriers, and a powerful body slam. Azure Reflections puts a spin on the traditional Touhou vertical shooter, boasting intense shoot’em up action from a horizontal perspective."

name: Azure
summary: In this near-future 3D first-person action shooter, you play a gun for hire, piloting a bipedal mech to tear down the enemy frontlines. Your missions involve on-rails segments where you shoot foes using a reticule, plus off-rails maze exploration with combat and collectibles. Can you survive this mechanized war, protect your companions, and seize victory?

name: Azurea Juncture
summary: After somehow surviving a plane incident involving a terrorist and a pair of hijackers, Effie finds herself in a cabin conveniently located in the middle of the ocean. In this cabin, she meets a sentient houseplant named Ana.

name: Azuran Tales: Trials
summary: Azuran Tales: Trials offers challenging combat, beautiful levels and merciless enemies to overcome. Journey across the World of Azuran as you discover its many environments, lore and history in a game that blends platformers with RPG elements.

name: Azure Dreams
summary: Game Boy Color port of Azure Dreams.

name: Azure Flame
summary:
Vance and Carmelo, 2 friends who have lived in the city of Calida—capital city of the region of Dracaena, where dragons come from—since their birth have recently started dating.

Unfortunately, Carmelo’s family doesn’t approve of Vance due to old family traditions as well as the unspoken "rules" of Dracaena. To make matters worse, Vance is discriminated against for being a hybrid and not a “pure” dragon.

Will these lovers be able to escape? Or are they doomed to be separated?

name: Azaran: The Demon Bottle
summary: A short dungeon crawler packed with monsters, traps, and cryptic puzzles. Made in 3 weeks as a companion to Azaran: Islands of the Jinn.

name: Aztech Forgotten Gods
summary: Aztech Forgotten Gods is the cyber-stone action-adventure following Achtli, a young woman who battles the colossal Forgotten Gods. To uncover the truth behind her far-future Mesoamerican metropolis, she'll have to turn the Gods' power against them, as she soars through the city with power and grace using an ancient artifact, remnant of a time long forgotten.

name: Aztecs: The Last Sun
summary: Aztecs The Last Sun is a simulator of building a city set between the 13th and 16th century CE. The player takes on the role of the ruler responsible for building and bringing to splendor the magnificent Tenochtitlan city-state. This amazing architectural wonder was historically located on an island in the middle of Lake Texcoco. This in itself will represent a technological and economic challenge for the player, who will have to provide food for his people and to maintain a permanent trade connection with the outside world. But that's not all. With some heavy decision-making and a survival aspect, where you have to defend your city against nightly attacks by the Moon Goddess and their relentless minions, Aztecs: The Last Sun takes city-building out of your comfort zone.

name: Azoove
summary: Adventure with friends in this co-op card roguelike, bravely crossing the dangerous Azoove desert. Manage resources and communicate effectively to survive the journey and return the cursed book to the Library. Strategize and make it there in time to seal the evil fiend Ur'gan!

name: Azure Haven
summary: Step in to the Haven

name: Azure Hue
summary: A young woman finds a blue gem, and starts to experience strange things. How could something so beautiful bring about such awful visions? There's got to be a more reasonable explanation. I mean... "bad luck charms" don't really exist... right?

name: Azure Striker Gunvolt 2
summary: "The 2D high speed, old-school style side-scrolling action that you remember from Azure Striker Gunvolt is back! In this game, Gunvolt's rival Copen from the first installment returns to the fray as a playable character!"

name: Azayaka na Irodori no Naka de Kimi Rashiku: Premium Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Game: Azayaka na Irodori no Naka de Kimi Rashiku
- Dr. Kumi Horii Drawing down Tapestry
- Dr. Koichi Kaneki Short Story
- Purchase Bonus: DLC 0.1

name: Azooma Escape
summary: Hide. Dodge flying slippers. Avoid that "ONE" uncle determined to feed you. Your mission: escape Uncle's celebration alive and unfed. This culturally rich stealth comedy follows an introverted teen fleeing the world's most persistent hospitality. Can you survive the family gathering?

name: Aztec Tiki Talisman
summary: Embark on a thrilling adventure in Aztek Tiki Talisman! Explore 50 challenging levels in the mystical Aztec jungle, battle foes, solve puzzles, and confront epic bosses. Will you find the blue talisman and unlock the portal to the next level?

name: Azoth
summary: Build game-breaking combos as you ascend through challenging rituals in this strategic deck builder. Master the unique card linking resource system and discover infinite procedural possibilities.

name: Azusa 999
summary: Azusa 999 is an RPG Maker adventure game developed in 1997 for the classic Japanese PC-98 personal computer. It's a heavy emotional story about suicide and an otherworldly train… among other things.

name: Azu-Beach
summary: AzuBeach is a fanmade EasyGameStation game for PC. It is from 2002. It is based on the Azumanga Daioh anime and manga and features the characters facing each other in volleyball matches.

name: Azure Saga: Pathfinder - Deluxe Edition
summary: Far into the future, the human race survives through colonies scattered across the universe. One tale gives humanity’s remnants hope – one of the legendary planet, Azure, a world full of life and abundant resources that could bring humanity back from the brink of extinction. Join a young scientist, Synch, as he travels across the galaxy to meet new companions and find his father.

name: Azur Promilia
summary: Azur Promilia is a fantasy world RPG with creature companionship. Step into a fantasy world, utterly different from the world you know. The world of various civilizations, magic and incredible fantasy creatures, together with tales echoing in the starry sky. Take a daring leap from the sky into the ocean, to once again encounter and bond with new life. Guided by shooting stars, amid the sparkling constellations, this is your very own journey. The entire universe eagerly anticipates the ballad of stars and odyssey, exclusively yours to unfold.

name: Azure Sheep
summary: Azure Sheep is a single player mod for Half-Life. The player is one of the Barney guards that is on post in one of the entrances of the Black Mesa facility When the chaos starts you realize that Kate, your college, code name 'Azure Sheep' is in the complex and in big dangers. You decide to rescue her...

name: Azumanga Donjara Daiou DX
summary: A version of the board game Donjara/Ponjan featuring characters and art from Azumanga Daioh. Inspired by the PlayStation game Azumanga Donjara Daiou.

name: Azada: Elementa
summary: PC

name: Azusa RP Online
summary: Azusa Online is an open world roleplay driven game, focused in developing the world and story of your character while interacting with other players. Compete in tournaments around the world to earn rights to wear the legendary Olympian armors and help defy gods; Athena, Hades, Zeus and Poseidon.

name: Azlan: Rise of the Burlpups
summary: New to VR or Tower Defense? Learn to Plan, attack & defend in this immersive VR strategy game. Get ready for massive tower defense battles in VR as AZLAN defends Zalolo Land from total ruin. With a vast arsenal of upgradable cannons, arrows, and crystal towers at your command, can your skill & craft save Zalolo from Rise of the...

name: Azmar Quest
summary: Azmar Quest is a text-based RPG, with turn-based battles and old-school vibes. The single-player main story should last at least 20 hours, then there's a lot of additional content! And if you play online, you can also fight in PvP and play Dungeons. Choose your class and let the adventure begin!

name: Aztec Mayhem!
summary: Aztec Mayhem is a fast-paced 2D top-down shooter with the difference being that this one is about a... slime with a gun?!!?!??!??

name: Azure Striker Gunvolt Trilogy Enhanced
summary:
This release contains the 3 classic side-scrolling 2D action games "Azure Striker Gunvolt" (2014), "Azure Striker Gunvolt 2" (2016), and "Azure Striker Gunvolt 3" (2022), including all available DLC.

Enjoy not just the action, but deep story that plays out without interrupting gameplay in "Live Novel" dialog that plays during missions. With full voiceover (Japanese only in Gunvolt 1 and 2) and a total of 37 vocal tracks sung by the "Muses", you'll be immersed in the near-future dystopian world.

In addition, the series director has renewed all three titles, polishing the action gameplay and updating the music. Previously separately available items such as voice drama CDs are now included in-game in Library Mode, making for the most complete "final version" of the trilogy.

name: Azito 2
summary: Azito 2 is the second game in the series, the most important difference between this game and Azito is that in Azito 2 the player can choose between the evil side or the justice side at the beginning of the game.

name: Azura
summary: Azura - exciting adventure story in the genre of RPG. Explore an unknown island. Classic combat turn-based system in the best traditions of JRPG, non-linear plot with the choice of the path and juicy anime graphics.

name: Azur Lane: Crosswave
summary:
The newcomers have joined the four nations which are the Eagle Union, Royal Navy, Ironblood, and Sakura Empire. Each of them is getting along and training every day.

In this time, the four nations decided to collaborate and support the "Joint War Game."

Each of the participants will raise their fighting spirits before the grand event in which a few selected members are only chosen to take part.

…How did the Joint War Games come to be held so quickly?
…Who is pulling the strings behind the scenes?

With some mysteries, encounters, and greatly hidden ambitions, a new naval battle never before realized is about to unfold!

name: Azure Striker Gunvolt
summary: A 2D action game featuring a young man with the power of lightning who stands for freedom against the evil ambitions of a massive organization. When lightning strikes, a new legend is born.

name: Aztec Wars
summary: Aztec Wars is a budget RTS game that takes place in an alternate history 17th century Europe where the “Russes” and “Cathayans” must fight back an invasion from the Atlantic crossing Aztecs (who have already conquered France, Germany, and Spain).

name: Aztarac
summary: The actual game has you piloting a little space tank. The tank and its turret are controlled independently, which allows you to move in one direction while shooting in another. Your mission is to guard various space outposts from hordes of incoming enemy ships. Each level will have several outposts all clustered together in the center. If an enemy ship touches an outpost, then the outpost is destroyed. You can activate a long range scanner by using your second button. This allows you to locate enemies before they get close, that way you can fly off and get them before they even have a shot at the outposts.

name: Azito
summary: In Azito, the player takes the role of chief commander of a new secret base. Weapons, in the form of Mechs are developed and used to defend the secret base from enemy attacks. The secret base must be protected in order to be completed. The player cannot attack enemy bases, but only intercept the enemy units. As the player chooses their attributes with the help of specialized staff, a variety of weapons can be developed, and the appearance of the base will change depending on what is being developed.

name: Azrael
summary: Azrael is a first-person Detective/Horror Game in which you play as a detective capable of reliving crime scenes. Explore different environments, find clues and try to find out who is the serial killer in a murder case among a group of friends.

name: Azorius
summary: Explore the world, get resources, go through dungeons, solve puzzles, fight monsters, use magic, craft items, build a settlement and recruit residents!

name: Azur Lane
summary:
Azur Lane is a side-scrolling shoot 'em up video game created by Chinese developers Shanghai Manjuu and Xiamen Yongshi, released in 2017 for the iOS and Android operating systems. Set in an alternate timeline of World War II, players engage in side-scrolling shooter gameplay, using female moe anthropomorphic characters based on warships from the war's major participants. Other gameplay elements, like customizing a home and marrying in-game characters, are also present.
First launched in China in May and in Japan in September 2017, Azur Lane has become very popular, especially in Japan where the player count reached five million within four months after its release. Players have voted the game among the top five on Google Play's Best Game of 2017 list for the region. Critics have attributed the game's popularity to its original and well-designed gameplay system.

name: Azura's Crystals
summary: Embark on an enchanting quest as Azura, a spirited heroine, and discover a world of ancient mysticism. Forge unbreakable bonds with mythical creatures using the power of Primalis Crystals. Traverse breathtaking landscapes, make difficult choices, and uncover the secrets that shape your destiny.

name: Azangara
summary:
Azangara - 3D labyrinth arcade game with original visualization. It shows vertical maze world consisting of the number of palaces.
Your path is full of adventures and dangers: moving floor, disappearing bridges, burning abysses, flashes of lightning, etc. Monsters are keeping the secrets behind each door.
Each palace represents a unique style, emphasized by music and animation. You shall expect wonderful journey through the labyrinths of the ancient castles and tangled dungeons in search for great treasures and exciting rewards in order to open centuries-long mystery.

name: Azhar Erriad: Hamzaoui Is Missing
summary: Welcome to Azhar Erriad School, You are a new student at Azhar Erriad School, where nothing is quite as it seems. Your arrival coincides with the mysterious disappearance of Hamzaoui. Explore the school, meet its quirky students, and unravel the secrets hidden in the school.

name: Azure Striker Gunvolt: Striker Pack
summary:
The game contains both Azure Striker Gunvolt and Azure Striker Gunvolt 2 packaged together with all the first games DLC and a new song.

The Switch version runs at 60 fps, has a new UI, has all previous dlc for both games from the 3DS, has a new theme song, and game play improvements like re-balancing difficulty and changing the Kudos system from the first game to the one used in the second.

name: Azkend 2: The World Beneath
summary: Azkend 2: The World Beneath is a beautifully polished match-three adventure game set in an awe-inspiring underground world. Enjoy superbly smooth casual matching puzzle gameplay, an engaging storyline with voiceovers, and hidden object minigames.

name: Azazel Gamble
summary: Join Azazel's lethal gambling arena—a high-stakes showdown of life or death. at a 4-player table with allies or adversaries, where cunning strategies and skills determine survival. Hunting demon or being hunted? Team up or solo.Hey guys !Are you ready to embrace the chaos of a blood-soaked gamble?

name: Aztaka
summary: Inspired by Aztec legend, this action/rpg side-scroller will casts you into the middle of a war between the Gods and Mankind. As Huitzilo, heir of the Sun God, skilled in both the arts of combat and magic, only you can save your people from the wrath of the Aztec Gods by reuniting the seven phonograms. Accompanied by your faithful companion Ayopha - trapped in the form of a hummingbird by a magical curse – you will overcome the obstacles in you path through a combination of fighting prowess and spiritual magic.

name: Azumanga Donjara Daiou
summary: The game is a combination of the popular comic Azumanga Daioh and table top game "Donjara". The tiles are ready to use in battle with patterns of the characters faces. See polygon rendered deformed characters portray the happy action.

name: Aznak
summary: Ivan Abel, a young village boy who's mother was abducted by a mad king and his knights. Gathering companions at different locations to create our cast of party members he is able to experience all different types of regions and cultures. Can they save his mother and the world?

name: Azurael's Circle: Chapter 1
summary: Azurael's Circle: Chapter 1 is a horror-mystery adventure game where you must find the truth about your mother's death. What evils await you in the depths of the Lancaster farmhouse? The further you go, the more strange things get.

name: Azure Sky
summary: Azure Sky is an action, puzzle and platform game. You need to take on the role of a young man, who will later gain power over his consciousness and learn to master magical abilities.

name: Azure Dreams
summary: The game offers a lot of choice in respect to how individual players wish to play. The main focus of the game is entering the tower and destroying its denizens, collecting treasure and monster eggs to hatch into familiars. Each monster has hidden spells, unique traits, and abilities. Koh can also improve the town, along with decorating his home.

name: Aztec Adventure
summary: Gameplay involves the player trying to reach Paradise by exploring ten different lands, including desert, marshes, ruins, underground waterways, and forest. While exploring you can collect weapons, by destroying plants. A variety of in-game weapons can be found, some more powerful than others. Some weapons can be used against bosses, which can take a certain amount of hits from the player's default weapon, unless he has companions. The player's companions need to be hired with gold, and until he pays them they remain your enemies. Players must either bribe them or battle them to make them join his quest.

name: Aztec Number
summary:
Challenge puzzle masters from all over the world
Accompanied by powerful sound effects,
solve 108 puzzles
and take possession of
the secret treasure of the Aztecs.

name: Azur Lane: Crosswave - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Azur Lane: Crosswave
Original design box
Artbook
Puchi Drama & Mini Soundtrack CD
Special-make Chibi Figure

name: Azure Moon
summary: A large base-themed map inspired by Half-Life 1 / Black Mesa with a ton of blue and green lighting, hence the name. The author's first release.

name: Azure Snake
summary: Azure Snake is a beautiful snake in the world of light.

name: Aztecalypse
summary:
Action adventure with an apocalyptic touch.
In Aztecalypse you explore a newly discovered area with remnants of an ancient culture. If you like First Person Action games set in mystic places, in an Open World with neat places to visit aside the story, you will definitely love this game!

name: Azumi and the Vertical Slice
summary: Azumi and the Vertical Slice is a proof of concept for a 2D action platformer that attempts to bring modern indie speed and catharsis to the classic days of the Sega Mega Drive and Blast Processing. Fight through a wave of enemies and escape the room you're trapped in!

name: Azerion
summary: First / third person multiplayer shooter with single and multiplayer AI bots and monster, premade and procedural environments.

name: Azu-Cola
summary: A doujin puzzle game reminiscent of Columns featuring Azumanga Daioh characters.

name: Azzle
summary: Azzle is an amazing tile puzzle game that will keep you entertained for many hours. The goal is simple: take or use your favorite picture and solve the puzzle made from it.

name: Azu-Race Taisen Battle He-Cho
summary: A doujin racing game akin to Mario Kart featuring the cast of Azumanga Daioh.

name: Aztec Tomb Adventure
summary: You try to find a way into an Aztec tomb.

name: Azurael's Circle: Chapter 4
summary: Azurael's Circle: Chapter 4 is a horror-mystery adventure game. Explore your suburb and work out where your neighbours have disappeared to and who's watching you from the shadows.

name: Azagthoth
summary: A collection of larger maps than normal Doom2. Should provide about four hours of play on Ultra-Violence. Three of these maps were released in earlier versions as "Perdido", 1,2 & 3.

name: Aztec Ride
summary: Give your Aztec community the roller coaster ride of their lives!

name: AZZL
summary:
A game mixture crafted to extract the most Yays Per Minute.
Our animation puzzles get so juicy that the virtuality will never be the same again.
This is what will be at your fingertips and quickly work its way into your mind.

name: AZ: Oath of Brotherhood Prologue 1
summary: This game intends to create a simple gameplay and story-heavy experience. Players will help a teenage boy go through a tough time in his life. A story that shows how friendship works when we need it the most.

name: Azure Striker Gunvolt 3: Ex Image Pulses - Nova and Desna pack
summary: This pack adds 4 skill-type Image Pulses of Azure Striker Gunvolt's "Nova," 4 skill-type Image Pulses of Azure Striker Gunvolt 2's "Desna," plus 3 additional passive-type Image Pulses, for a total of 11.

name: Aztec Adventure: The Golden Road to Paradise
summary: Aztec Adventure is an action game that was released on the Sega Master System by Sega in 1987 in Japan, and 1988 in Europe and the US.

name: Aztec Empire
summary: Aztec Empire is a city-building strategy and city manager. Become a ruler of the great city-state of Tenochtitlan. Develop a city, build an army. Let your people flow in riches!

name: Azure Be Gone
summary: Medium sized runic / metal themed level in a classic style, a remix of the author's 2004 release "Azure Influx" (flecksp1).

name: Azarashi Sentai Inazuma: Doki-doki Daisakusen
summary: Azarashi Sentai Inazuma: Doki-doki Daisakusen is a Japanese only Game Boy Color game.

name: Azito x Tatsunoko
summary: A version of the robot and base-building strategy game based on Tatsunoko's legendary anime properties.

name: Azu-Tama
summary: A doujin game in which you can play as Chiyo or Osaka, defending themselves during a snowball fight against other members of the Azumanga Daioh cast.

name: Azurik: Rise of Perathia
summary: A high-profile, first-party Xbox title that pits you in a battle to bring justice to your land, Perathia. "Azurik: Rise of Perathia" will have a heavy focus on action, jaw-dropping graphics and a unique, element-based combat system.

name: Azumanga Daioh Advance
summary: Azumanga Daioh Advance is a puzzle game released for the Gameboy Advance hand held system on April 25th, 2003. It was published and developed by King Records. Azumanga Daioh Advance was a Japan only release and was never planned to be sold over seas.

name: Azkend
summary: Enjoy the visions from the mystical world of Azkend in a puzzle game polished to perfection!

name: Azurael's Circle: Chapter 5
summary: Azurael's Circle is a horror-mystery adventure game. Navigate the manor and piece together the real reason why you're here. Combine items in your inventory to get into locked areas of the house and find other useful tools that can help you uncover the truth while meeting a few familiar faces.

name: Aztec Venture
summary: Discover mysterious Aztec treasures in this exciting match-3 game!

name: Azazel
summary: A roguelike about goats, sin, and the Book of Leviticus

name: Azur Lane: Crosswave - Sirius
summary: Unlocks Sirius, 3 new Support Ships, and additional Story Mode content.

name: Azrael
summary: Traverse this ominous 2D Dungeon Crawler as Azrael; A mysterious being. With three unique endings, the player is tasked to simply explore and watch as they learn more about their character, the situation, and consequences. Includes an original soundtrack and artwork.

name: Azaran: Islands of the Jinn
summary: A retro adventure inspired by 90's adventure games and Arabian Nights. Explore dungeons, solve puzzles, and collect awesome treasures

name: Aztec Assault
summary: A text adventure game for the ZX Spectrum.

name: Azumanga: The Fighting T-Style
summary: A doujin fighting game based on the Azumanga Daioh anime and manga series. There are 4 characters: Chiyo, Osaka, Kimura, and Chiyo-chichi.

name: Aznana
summary: Aznana is an idle adventure game developed by Caramel Column for mobile. Every villager has a music box or a sunflower head, except our protagonist. One day, he picked up a head named AZNANA and became friends with it. Players need to save their money, and getaway from the boring town they live in.

name: Azur Lane: Crosswave - Taihou
summary: Unlocks Taihou, 3 new Support Ships, and additional Story Mode content.

name: Azteca
summary: Azteca is a captivating puzzle game that challenges your strategic thinking and precision as you match and burst vibrant bubbles in a mesmerizing Aztec-themed setting. Immerse yourself in the rich tapestry of ancient civilizations while navigating through intricate levels filled with colorful orbs, each pop bringing you closer to unlocking the secrets of the Aztecs.

name: Azur Lane: Crosswave - Formidable
summary: Unlocks Formidable, 3 new Support Ships, and additional Story Mode content.

name: Azai: TD
summary: Challenging Tower Defense game with a procedural difficulty, interesting story and unique towers.

name: Azimech
summary: fight against waves of enemies to bring down the major forest entities !

name: Azure
summary: A final project of my college freshman year. Just jump and dash and have fun.

name: Azarashi Dentetsu
summary:
You are a rookie seal driver working in Antarctica.
Tilt the Joy-Con to steer the train in this new kind of electric train action!
The lives of these chubby seals are being threatened by a vicious killer whale!
The seals are being hunted by a vicious killer whale, and you'll have to steer the train to keep them from falling into the sea.
Drive them safely to the station and keep them from falling into the sea. Now, let's go!

name: Azurael's Circle: Chapter 3
summary: Azurael's Circle: Chapter 3 is a horror-mystery adventure game. Explore the Old Ways nursing home and speak to the various residents to learn the secrets and answers within the nursing home.

name: Azrael
summary: AZRAEL is an indies music game with nurturing elements. Through simple and straightforward operations, anyone can enjoy the fun by playing. The game includes tracks created by artists from all over the world, as well as exquisite seal paintings drawn by illustrators. Each piece of music has produced a key tone score, which can bring players the immersive experience like playing their own music.

name: Azure Sky Project
summary: A Tactical 2D Shooter where the player has complete freedom on how to tackle missions. Engage in our 15 hand-built campaign missions or farm up some money in our randomly generated "Freelance Work" missions using the gear and strategies that YOU choose!

name: Azure '88
summary: Azure '88 is a fast-paced 2D platformer game with a roller-skating-based movement system. Explore the economically and socially broken Earth in the year 2088, where our main protagonist desperately wants to escape by getting into a space shuttle to prosperous Mars that leaves once a decade.

name: Azera Online
summary: A free to play Korean MMORPG.

name: Azada
summary: Trapped in a magical puzzle book, the adventurous Titus needs your help to release him from his spell. To do this, you must solve the tricky puzzles of Azada. Crack the series of puzzles and fill in the missing pages of the enchanted book to free Titus from his prison. Loads of unique puzzles to solve.

name: Azumanga RPG
summary: A dungeon crawler game starring Chiyo from Azumanga Daioh. She attacks by walking into enemies.

name: Azure Wing: Rising Gale
summary: Far into the future, a young soldier awakes from a centuries long slumber to find himself in a world that has regressed to a more primitive form. Armed with advanced A.I. assisted weapons, he seeks to discover what happened to the world, and the friends he left behind.

name: Azurael's Circle: Chapter 2
summary: Azurael's Circle: Chapter 2 is a horror-mystery adventure game where you must track down five missing teenagers in an abandoned apartment complex. There's something sinister awaiting you inside. Beware.

name: Azito 3
summary: The final PlayStation entry in the base and super-robot building series.

name: Azurian Attack
summary: Azurian Attack is a shoot 'em up arcade game released by Rait Electronics in 1982. The game features similar graphics and sounds to "Galaxian" except your fighter can move in 8 directions. The game was programmed inhouse by Rait Electronics who were based in Christchurch, New Zealand and the game code runs on a modified Galaxian Board.

name: Azeri: Journey's End
summary:
Take control of the legendary shapeshifting fox Azeri, as it goes on its final journey to breathe life back into a dying world.

Control 3 unique animals
Each animal has its own ability
Set in beautiful desolation, with remenants of the old world being taken over by nature

This project was built for the Unreal Spring Jam 2020.

name: Azazel's Second Descent
summary: Azazel's Second Descent is a full, 32 map megawad. This is a one-man megawad and all maps were made by me. I would categorize the maps as slaughter-lite, meaning it is not full-on slaughter but you might face a horde or two, especially the farther into the wad you go. The WAD is broken down into six 5-map episodes. There are 4 new monster types and 2 bosses added.

name: Azada: Elementa - Collector's Edition
summary: Azada’s saga continues when its precious elements are stolen!

name: Azada: Ancient Magic
summary: Point-and click adventure and sequel to Azada.

name: Aztec Tribe
summary: Eons ago, a peaceful tribe lived in the mountains, enemies surrounding it on every side. To escape, the people sent out scouts to search for a new home in the valley. When the explorers found a suitable spot, the tribe began the process of creating a glorious new civilization!

name: AzuTower
summary:
AzuTower is a Pizza Tower mod that replaces some of the characters with characters from the anime Azumanga Daioh.
Starring Chiyo Mihama as Peppino, Ayumu "Osaka" Kasuga as Gustavo, and more!

name: Azur Lane: Crosswave - Le Malin
summary: Unlocks Le Malin, 3 new Support Ships, and additional Story Mode content.

name: Azazel's Christmas Fable
summary: A wacky 8-bit retro-style point and click Christmas adventure, reminiscent of '90s classics. Explore Santa's village as a devilish imp with a mischievous knack for getting into trouble. Solve puzzles and uncover mysteries while meeting some peculiar characters along the way.

name: Azzy Battles the Darkness
summary: Azzy Battles the Darkness is a 3D action-platformer about technological misuse within an elementally charged land, and the adorable Felko, Azzy, who is swept on a journey that may decide the fate of the whole world

name: Azure Domain
summary: Azure Domain is an aerial dogfighting game with a huge world, intense action, and a deeply rich story. Between ancient goddesses, extradimensional beings, maniacal dictators and corrupt leaders, it's hard to simply be a fighter pilot.

name: Azalta
summary: Azalta is an adventure/role-playing game. But unlike most other games of this type, Azalta is much more than a simple single adventure; it is an entire game system with endless adventures, an infinite number of large worlds to explore, hundreds of puzzles to solve, creatures to meet, and items to find -- you can even create your own worlds/creatures/items!

name: Azur Lane: Crosswave - Commanders Calendar Edition
summary:
This Commander's Calendar Edition includes:

- Azur Lane: Crosswave
- 2020 Calendar

name: Aztec Tribe: New Land
summary: Restore the once prosperous civilization back from the brink in Aztec Tribe - New Land, an all-new challenge blending strategy and resource management. The Aztecs have fallen victim to a terrible twist of fate as torrential rains, earthquakes and a volcanic eruption wiped their land clean. As their leader, you must restore the band of struggling natives to their former glory.

name: Azur Ring: Virgin and Slave's Phylacteries
summary: New Metroidvania + RPG adventure game. Legendary gear! Unique set, a large number of magical equipment to provide you with unlimited possibilities to equip build. Gorgeous and fluent act combo system, give you the operating space to challenge the limit!

name: Azur & Asmar
summary: Based on the feature film of Michel Ocelot, Azur & Asmar is a platform game where the player helps the two heroes in their quest to find the Djinn-fairy and release her from her chamber. The story and the visuals are inspired by North-African and Middle-Eastern folklore.

name: Azu Quiz Daioh
summary: A quiz and typing game in which you play as Kimura. If you run out of time or answer too many questions incorrectly, you lose. If you win, the opponent must participate in a punishment game.

name: Azimuth
summary: Azimuth is a metroidvania game, and something of an homage to the previous greats of the genre (Super Metroid in particular). You will need to pilot your ship, explore the inside of the planet, fight enemies, overcome obstacles, and uncover the storyline piece by piece. Azimuth features a huge game world to explore, lots of little puzzles to solve, dozens of weapons and upgrades to find and use, and a wide variety of enemies and bosses to tangle with.

name: Azayaka na Irodori no Naka de, Kimi Rashiku
summary: A visual novel from Prekano.

name: AzuFight: Taisen Shiyo
summary: AzuFight: Taisen Shiyo is a doujin fighting game based on the Azumanga Daioh anime and manga series. Not to be confused with Azumanga The Fighter T-Style, though possibly meant to serve as a sequel or expansion.

name: Azarine Heart
summary: What will you sacrifice; for the safety of your sister?

name: Azur Lane: Crosswave - Roon
summary: Unlocks Roon, 3 new Support Ships, and additional Story Mode content.

name: A Zombie Tail
summary: Defeat waves of zombies in this strategy defense style game. Armed with a bone and several power ups, keep the zombies at bay as you battle across several levels, by timing and managing your attacks across 4 lanes. Will Roxy find her human before the zombies do!

name: Azy
summary: Destroy enemies and bosses using a variety of weapons. Visit different times and places with unique enemies. Inspired by classic games from the of 90s genre.

name: Aztec Tower
summary: Aztec Tower is a VR bow & arrow game about defending the temple of your people against the spanish conquistadors.

name: Azrael's Tear
summary: The player is a Raptor, a highly sophisticated thief armed with cutting edge equipment, who has just received word from a competitor that they may have found the Holy Grail. Offering to split the profits with your for your help, you make your way to the ancient resting place.

name: Azrael on the Boundary of Life or Death
summary:
Rihito Souda has just started working for a major construction company in April.

Even though he is assigned to a different deparment than the one he was hoping for, he meets a senior employee by the name of Reimi Nagashima, and he slowly begins to fall in love with her.

He has a rewarding job, kind parents, and awesome friends.... All of these things seemed ideal, until one day he begins to have terrifying nightmares.

The frequency of these nightmares increases with each passing month and slowly begins to consume his life.

name: Azarashi
summary:
An adorably cute game that will challenge your reflexes and keep you coming back. Use your lightning-fast fingers to stop one of three seal keychains from dropping. Your score depends on your reflex - if you catch the seal quickly, you will get more points. Make sure you're not too fast with your finger, or the seal might get hurt!

Azarashi is a classic arcade style game from Studio Pixel, the creator of Kero Blaster and Cave Story. Simple and addicting, it's a great way to kill time.

name: Azar
summary: Azar is a top view shoot'em up where you and your friends must rebel against the violence of the police and the lies of the mainstream media! Get prizes in robberies and damage to property! Have fun in various different scenarios full of shooting action, hard bosses to defeat and a lot of glass to break!

name: Azathoth-D: Youtou Saisoku Densetsu
summary: A racing game starring the characters of Demonbane

name: Azumanga Daioh Puzzle Bobble
summary: This is a version of the traditional Puzzle Bobble / Bust-A-Move originally made by Taito but featuring characters from the Manga and Anime series "Azumanga Daioh". It was released only in Japan.

name: Azada: In Libro Collector's Edition
summary: Save the three worlds contained inside of a magical book in Azada: In Libro! Stop a dark magician from conquering Azada!

name: Azur Beam
summary: Azur Beam is a fun arcade game with beautiful music, lots of levels and colorful illustrations of anime girls! In Azur Beam you will find 53 extraordinarily beautiful, difficult and interesting levels, after passing which you will open full access to the Gallery.

name: Azrael
summary: A high-flying four player brawler with fast paced, high power combat.

name: Azumanga Daioh! The Druglord Game
summary:
In this game you play the role of one of the biggest mob bosses in your country. However, all of your underlings have ran off to lead honest lives. To make matters worse, the meeting with your mob boss peers is fast approaching.

An eccentric high school teacher named Yukari is willing to lend out three of her students as apprentice drug lords. It is your job to train them and choose the student most worthy of becoming your new drug lord.

name: Aztec Challenge
summary:
In the Aztec empire you were chosen for sacrifice.
A forthcoming violent death you can only escape when a risky obstacle course face - the "Aztec Challenge".
But that is no picnic: at the beginning it will be from "all sides" . pelted with spears, while one has to work its almost endless way to the temple

Once there it is not friendly: trapdoors, falling boulders, snakes and spiders waiting for new victims.

it is a moral imperative and a two-player mode - unfortunately alternate the players then only from.

the game features 7 breathtaking levels (plus end bonus), in which a good reactivity is required. The graph corresponds unfortunately only the ordinary 1984, but does not spoil the good game idea. Moreover, good acoustics for the right mood makes.

Ideal: one has reached a higher level, you do not have to start again when all lives are exhausted.

name: Azada: in Libro
summary: Save the three worlds contained inside of a magical book in Azada: In Libro! After being approached by a notary and being informed of an inheritance, you travel off to Prague and find the magical book. One of Azada’s guardians, Titus, informs you that you have been chosen to save the different worlds, so you’re off on an incredible adventure! Stop an evil magician from conquering Azada and protect the guardians in this incredible Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

name: Azure Orphanage
summary: One day, while secretly searching for the Empire's heritage, orphan Niina encounters a "demon," believed to be a survivor of the war, in an unexplored cave. At the same time, various incidents unfold, gradually devouring the orphans’ daily lives...

name: Aztec: Hunt for the Sun-God
summary: You are Quick-lizard, a young Aztec coppersmith. You have woken from a strange dream to find that the sun has failed to rise. The only light is the dull glow from the volcano; Condor Mountain. Scared, you rush into the village to find that no one is there. Alone you must interpret your dream and begin your adventure. Where is the sun? Where are the people of the village? As your journey begins strange creatures will appear, sometimes evil and sometimes friendly, but never quite as they seem.

name: Aztec
summary: In your search for the Idol you clamber through ancient ruins, evading traps and monsters while searching chests for some rare but much needed items to help you in your quest.

name: Aztlán Codex: El códice de los ancestros
summary: Aztlán Codex: Join Sarah Martinez on an epic hack and slash adventure with platforming. Explore mystical worlds, battle deities, and uncover ancient secrets. Find all six volumes of the Codex and change reality. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Azurebreak Heroes
summary: Help a pack of Heroes escape a demonic prison-world in Azurebreak Heroes! Delve through dark caves, mystic temples, strange woods and other mysterious places in a colorful, yet dark world of Heldia in this 2D RPG with roguelite elements and permanent progression.

name: Azure Influx
summary: Around medium sized linear b/w Metal map

name: Azure Saga: Pathfinder
summary: Dive into the world of Azure Saga: Pathfinder and band together to search for the legendary planet that will save humanity. Battle your enemies in JRPG-style turn-based combat, and explore a 2.5D isometric landscape imbued with hand-drawn visuals.

name: Azure Striker Gunvolt 3
summary:
Fates are sealed as paradigms shift and a new era unfolds. What lies beyond the path toward hope?

Inti Creates' flagship 2D side-scrolling "Azure Striker GUNVOLT" series is back with a brand new title!

Just as they did for the previous two games in the series, action supervisor Keiji Inafune will be working closely with series director Yoshihisa Tsuda of Inti Creates to craft new systems and ideas that take the action the series is known for to the next level.
